Dwarven:
During the course of the Blessing of Protection You can not get any damage from Chaotic characters higher than level 10 on your, or to put it. Suddenly, right?
But is the real hero needs these charms? They are for wimps!

Conditions for obtaining Blessing of Protection
Available for characters below level 39
Available for the first Artey to Liberation
2nd change of profession: Human, Elf,Dark Elf, Orc, Dwarven, Kamael
